verses.verse: Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>to<s%> <S%H430>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> there till <S%H6153>even<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voices<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>sore<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, why is this come to pass in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that there should be <S%H3117>to-day<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H6485>lacking<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> and <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is there among all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> not up in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? For they had made a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> concerning him that came not <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> cut <S%H1438>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

How shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain<s%>, seeing we have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that we will not <S%H5414>give<s%> them of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H802>wives<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H259>one<s%> is there of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that came not <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>? <S%H935>And<s%>, behold, there came <S%H376>none<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> to the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.
For when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, <S%H376>behold<s%>, there were none of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> there.

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> thither <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>valiantest<s%>, and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>.

And this is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%>: ye shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%>, and every <S%H802>woman<s%> that hath <S%H4904>lain<s%> by <S%H3045>man<s%>.

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%>, that had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2145>him<s%>; and they <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H1696>spake<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> that were in the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> peace unto <S%H7965>them<s%>.

And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>; and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H802>women<s%> whom they had saved <S%H2421>alive<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%>: and yet so they sufficed them <S%H4672>not<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, because that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> in the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain<s%>, seeing the <S%H802>women<s%> are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, There must be an <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> for them that are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, that a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> be not <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Howbeit we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2282>Behold<s%>, there is a feast of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> from year to <S%H3117>year<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, on the east <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H4546>highway<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3829>Lebonah<s%>.
And they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>,

and <S%H7200>see<s%>, <S%H1323>and<s%>, behold, if the daughters of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H2342>dance<s%> in the <S%H4246>dances<s%>, then come ye <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H2414>catch<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And it shall <S%H1>be<s%>, when their fathers or their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7378>complain<s%> unto <S%H559>us<s%>, that we will say unto <S%H2603>them<s%>, Grant them graciously unto <S%H3947>us<s%>, because we took not for each <S%H376>man<s%> of them his <S%H802>wife<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>, neither did ye <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto <S%H6256>them<s%>, else would ye now be <S%H816>guilty<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, of them that <S%H2342>danced<s%>, whom they <S%H1497>carried<s%> <S%H3212>off<s%>: and they went and <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and dwelt in <S%H3427>them<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> thence at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and to his <S%H4940>family<s%>, and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> from thence every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
